Text: RE HR Manager for GSP Cc Friday is my last day up here Louis is now in charge If you want to reach him you can call extension or email him at Hoyt Reply Separator Subject Re HR Manager for GSP Author SMTP at RICHMOND Date AM Lets make sure he visits or we visit him asap fine if this is after Embedded Enron Capital Trade Resources Corp image moved to file From picpcx PM To cc Subject HR Manager for GSP David Oxley and Michelle GSP has hired an HR Manager Louis Fauchaux who will begin work next Tuesday assuming that all his contingencies clear His resume is attached Amy Gambill in Enron HR located Louis for us Louis will be here next week thth then will return to New Jersey stay till and return His wife will come up in late January once their house sells David Howe and I have agreed that I will transition with Louis as necessary on and the days that our schedules overlap and that I will cover the HR function for GSP Thanksgiving week when Louis is not here I will be working on the many projects that we have at GSP when I am not transitioning with Louis Louis will take over the daytoday HR manager functions as soon as possible to free me up for this role David Howe and I have agreed that will be my last day onsite at GSP Louis does not have knowledge of Enron and because of this i believe that feedback to you on what is happening at GSP may be even slimmer than it has been with me I do not know if this will be a concern to you if it is then you may want to discuss how to address it If you decide that you want to bring Louis into Houston to meet with Enron people I would prefer that you do not do that until after so that Louis and i can maximize the benefit of our transition time and my project work Hoyt See attached file faucresdoc
